thoughts: Tries to imitate the battle moves of other Abyss dragons
Wonders if it is {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} fault or {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} teacher's fault that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} ended up here
Wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could put {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} hunting training to use
Tries to convince another Abyss dragon to train {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Misses eating fresh-kill and sharing tongues with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Clanmates
Stands by the Starfallen's border, hoping a dragon will take pity on {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Furiously grabs onto a branch so hard one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} claws chips
Tries to groom {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} dirty scales, only to realize it's too caked with mud to clean
